Text:
Hi GoAaT999, I have Sliders 10. 

They are compressed to 3.6 GB all 5 DVDs. If you want to upload it to your list, I could send it to.

Hi, Naivatco_2! Thanks for your offer! However, I just recently converted Sliders 8, as well, and am aiming to upload that and the rest of the Sliders Series by the end of this next weekend, if all goes as planned! :-)
